name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with 8 years of experience in full-stack development utilizing **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **Python**, and **React**. Adept in designing and implementing **REST APIs** for scalable SaaS applications, integrating advanced AI functionalities with tools like **LangChain** and **Vercel AI SDK**. Proven track record of collaborating across teams to drive innovation and enhance project outcomes.

My technical expertise extends into cloud environments, specifically **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring robust deployments of enterprise solutions. I possess a solid foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, delivering high-performance applications with compliance to standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My experience includes developing machine learning pipelines and serving models in production, empowering organizations to leverage data efficiently.
